庇.definition: to protect; cover; shelter; hide or harbor

庇佑.definition: to bless; to protect; protection (esp. divine)

庇祐.definition: to bless; to protect; protection (esp. divine); also written 庇佑[bi4 you4]

庇蔭.definition: to give shade (of a tree etc); to shield

庇西特拉圖.definition: Pisistratus (-528 BC), tyrant (ruler) of Athens at different times between 561 BC and 528 BC

庇護.definition: to shelter; to protect; to provide refuge; (law) asylum
